snippet: Some applications for Global Entry and other trusted traveler programs have been rejected for a minor brush with law enforcement or customs inspectors.
abstract: Some applications for Global Entry and other trusted traveler programs have been rejected for a minor brush with law enforcement or customs inspectors; Global Entry rejects 3 to 5 percent of travelers out of 30,000 applications month; often, no clear explanations are offered for rejections.
lead_paragraph: Some applications for Global Entry and other trusted traveler programs have been rejected for a minor brush with law enforcement or customs inspectors.

headline.seo: Global Entry Applications Rejected for Past Brushes With Law
